commitResults.messageBody:
For consistency with the other ABs, let's update AB-2 to JDK11.
Fortunately the codebase can be ported without any changes.

Change imports to JUnit 5 imports.

Replace @Before with @BeforeEach, ExpectedException with assertThrows,
TemporaryFolder with TempDir where applicable as the former are
removed in JUnit 5.

Add dependencies for JUnit 5 to build.gradle.txt.

Update DG to import JUnit 5.4x.

Add images to DG to illustrate the process of downloading of JUnit5.4
from Maven as the process varies on different versions of IntelliJ IDEA.

Update the DG to reflect the fully qualified package name of JUnit5.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update checkstyle ruleset to match later levels of AddressBook.
commitResults.messageBody:
Upgrade checkstyle version to 8.1 and checkstyle rules to match that of
later AddressBooks for consistency.

Add checkstyle checks into the buildfile to ensure that future commits
will remain compliant to checkstyle rules.

Fix checkstyle violations as the AddressBooks are meant to be models for
students to learn from.

Update dependencies in build.gradle.txt to reflect the required version
of checkstyle.

Add checkstyle checks to travis build.
